metadata.synopsis: Gith Guide encourages player to get to the helm. Has a mindmeld with the player but brushes it aside.

24.speaker: Losiir
24.text: Another survivor. We may yet see an end to this torment.

45.speaker: Player
45.text: Losiir. I see you've earned your robes.

1.speaker: Lae'zel
1.text: Losiir. I see you've earned your robes.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: *Your head throbs and your skin tingles. Visions rush past: a dragon's wing, a silver sword - and a flash of your face seen through the gith man's eyes.*

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *Your head throbs and your skin tingles. Visions rush past: a dragon's wing, a silver sword - and a flash of your face seen through the strange man's eyes.*

42.speaker: Losiir
42.text: By Vlaakith's touch, what is this?

4.speaker: Losiir
4.text: Tsk'va. The parasite has already taken hold. We must take to a crèche and be cleansed.

29.speaker: Losiir
29.text: But first, we must get to the helm.

44.speaker: Losiir
44.text: No - forget it. We must ready ourselves for battle. There are imps blocking our path.
44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

10.speaker: Losiir
10.text: We need to get rid of them and seek out the helm.
10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

53.speaker: Player
53.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

54.speaker: Losiir
54.text: It's where we gain control over the ship. We must travel the planes - leave Avernus, before these imps tear us apart.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: So they put a parasite in your eye, too?
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

8.speaker: Losiir
8.text: Yes, we risk turning into mind flayers. But purification will have to wait until we take control of the ship.

20.speaker: Player
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

6.speaker: Losiir
6.text: We're in Avernus. First of the Nine Hells.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

32.speaker: Losiir
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: Imps scavenging around corpses look up.

31.speaker: Losiir
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Gith guide leads.

25.speaker: Player
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Gith guide leads.

48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Gith guide leads.

49.speaker: Player
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Player in the lead.

13.speaker: Losiir
13.text: Very well - if you are fit to lead, our victory will be the proof!
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Player in the lead.

38.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player moves into position for combat. Player in the lead.

30.speaker: Player
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

34.speaker: Player
34.text: I'll pick them off from the shadows. They won't even know I was there.
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: The hunt begins... You lead, I'll cover you.
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

47.speaker: Losiir
47.text: Mark your prey, and we will split them open!

0.speaker: Player
0.text: You ready your weapon, I will ready my spells.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

2.speaker: Losiir
2.text: May the wounds you inflict match those of my blade!

33.speaker: Player
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: They stand in the way of the divine's will - they must be slain.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: On my oath - let us slay these foul creatures.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

52.speaker: Player
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

36.speaker: Player
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: We shall cast them into the void.
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: I need no weapon. My veins flow with arcane power.
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

16.speaker: Losiir
16.text: Then unleash it upon these infernal minions!
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

27.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players move into position for combat. Gith guide and player in parallel.

28.speaker: Losiir
28.text: Make them tremble with your music's fury!

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Close your eyes. Breathe deep. Prepare to fight.

39.speaker: Losiir
39.text: Good. Now go, and make every strike count!

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I know this place. We are in Avernus, first of the Nine Hells.

12.speaker: Losiir
12.text: Then you'll understand why we must leave at once.

35.speaker: Losiir
35.text: Lae'zel - you still live! May the Queen's favour be yours.
